about.title: About Me
description: I am Albaraa Almashwakhi, a recent physiotherapy graduate from Istinye University with hands-on clinical training across sports, neurological, and pediatric rehabilitation. Fluent in Arabic, English, and Turkish, I prioritize patient-centered care to restore function and improve quality of life.
Skilled in manual therapy, Kinesio Taping, and evidence-based rehabilitation techniques, I am passionate about empowering patients to achieve their recovery goals through tailored interventions.

items.title: Orthopedic & Prosthetic Physiotherapist
items.description: Helped amputees adapt to their new prosthetic limbs through personalized exercises and daily activity training. Worked closely with orthopedic patients to restore mobility and prevent long-term complications through targeted exercise programs.

items.title: Sports Rehabilitation Intern
items.description: Supported professional athletes through injury recovery, using hands-on therapy and sport-specific exercises. Played key role in developing return-to-play programs for ACL injuries and chronic shoulder conditions.

items.title: Critical Care Rehabilitation Intern
items.description: Helped ICU patients regain breathing capacity through chest physiotherapy and airway clearance techniques. Worked with vulnerable patients recovering from COVID-19 and pneumonia to rebuild lung function.

items.title: Neurology Rehabilitation Trainee
items.description: Helped stroke survivors regain independence through balance training and coordination exercises. Developed personalized plans to manage spasticity and improve communication skills in patients with MS and Parkinson's.

items.title: Pediatric Therapy Intern
items.description: Helped children with cerebral palsy and Down syndrome achieve developmental milestones through play-based therapy. Collaborated with families to create home exercise programs supporting motor skill development.

items.title: Orthotics Specialist Assistant
items.description: Worked with patients needing custom braces and supports, from children with scoliosis to adults with chronic foot pain. Helped improve posture and walking patterns through proper orthotic fitting.

items.title: Manual Therapy Apprentice
items.description: Used hands-on techniques to help patients with chronic back pain regain movement and reduce reliance on pain medication. Assisted in developing recovery plans for post-surgical patients and frozen shoulder cases.

items.title: Kinesio Taping Practitioner
items.description: Certified in Kinesio Taping techniques for injury management and performance enhancement.

items.title: Clinical Dry Needling
items.description: Specialized training in dry needling for musculoskeletal pain relief.

items.title: Cupping Therapy
items.description: Proficiency in cupping therapy for myofascial release and circulation improvement.
